oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Steve Dorff and Bobby Tomberlin - 2009-10-24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Steve Dorff and Bobby Tomberlin from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 24, 2009
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Steve Dorff; Bobby Tomberlin;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Questions taken from the audience. Performances include Heartland (Steve Dorff); I Just Fall In Love In Love Again (Steve Dorff); One More Day (Bobby Tomberlin); Steve Dorff sings excerpts from the following songs; Every Which Way But Loose; Bar Room Buddies; Coca Cola Cowboy; Cowboys And Clowns; The Man In Love With You; Lasso The Moon; Pie Pie Me Oh My; Once In A While; As Long As We Got Each Other; Why In The Hell Do You Think I Drink (Bobby Tomberlin); I Cross My Heart (Steve Dorff); Through the Years (Steve Dorff);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dorff, Steve; Tomberlin, Bobby; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
